title: so when zoe...
body: can hit her Q TAHT EASY and is WAY EASIER BCS THE SLEEP TO HIT than nidalee Q why dont buff nidalee and make her Q easier to hit? why nerf her hard to hit Q and give her more cd and W jump? why? when you bring out a one shot champ? tahts not fair.
